Job Purpose, Job Purpose, The purpose of a Traffic management engineer is to plan, design, and implement traffic systems and solutions to ensure the safe, efficient and sustainability of transportation system for movement of people, Heavy Equipment and goods. This includes the development of traffic management plans and the maintenance and construction of roads, Mine Haul Road, highways, bridges, tunnels, and other transportation infrastructure. Traffic management engineer must also analyze traffic patterns, evaluate the effectiveness of existing traffic systems, and create solutions to minimize congestion and maximize safety. They also may be involved in the installation and operation of traffic control systems, such as traffic signals and cameras., Accountabilities:, Accountabilities:, 1. Design, develop and implement traffic engineering solutions consist of traffic management plan, traffic capacity analisys, traffic calming measure, environmental consideration, 2. Analyse traffic data and develop traffic models consist of traffic signal timing, traffic flow analisys, traffic simulation modelling, 3. Prepare reports, plans and technical documents and ensuring that all traffic management plans and strategies comply with industrial and government regulations and safety standards, 4. Liaise with clients and relevant stakeholders regarding, engaging with the public and stakeholders to gather input, explain proposed changes, and address concerns related to traffic management projects, 5. Conduct site surveys and develop site designs, conduct collaborating with other depts and government agencies to ensure that traffic management efforts align with mining activities and urban planning goals, 6. Provide advice on traffic control measures, Monitor the effectiveness of traffic engineering solutions, Technical Specializations:, Technical Specializations:, 1. Technical skills and knowledge of traffic management operations including surveys, mapping, risk identification and operations support., 2. Extensive experience for cooperation with various relevant departments and government related to traffic management in the contract of work area., 3. Knowledge to identify and assess traffic management system within the contract of work area. And provide recommendations or mitigation plans., Requirements:, Requirements:, 1. Bachelor Degree (S1) in Civil Engineering, Mining Engineering., 2. Minimum 3 years related experience., 3. Good Communication, presentation and fluent in English both written and verbal., 3. Willing to be placed in all sites PT Vale Indonesia, Tbk..,
